title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 13 ยง 301.10 - Representation by counsel or third party
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 13 ยง 301.10 - Representation by counsel or third party

State Regulations

Any party may be represented by counsel or assisted by any third
party. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 13
ยง
301.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
